features: PREMIUM 48-PIECE BLACK SILVERWARE SET FOR 8: This flatware set contains 8 dinner forks, 8 salad forks, 8 dinner spoons, 8 dessert spoons, 8 dinner knives and 8 steak knives. It’s the ideal set for home daily use, and also for restaurants, pubs, cafes, and hotels. This cutlery set also help your dinner full of design while having a party.

8 STEAK KNIVES INCLUDED: 8 additional steak knives are offered in this pack that are also made of stainless steel with sharp serrations on the blades help it easy to cut meat, and being ideal to use for eating. The triple riveting handle is strong and durable even when cut hard, and the ergonomic design makes it very comfortable to hold.

COMFORTABLE DESIGN: This flatware set has a classic silhouette with clean lines and polish-finish surface in all black, a good choice to go with your existing tableware. The smooth edge of the handle is pleasure to hold, appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use.

HIGH-QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL: Made of premium food-grade stainless steel, providing the longest term value and the best properties, it offers nice resistance to rust and corrosion to get the most sturdy and healthy experience while using, never bend in daily use.

DRAWER ORGANIZER INCLUDED: This five compartments drawer organizer provides a great solution to your cutlery. Measures 13" x 11.8", fits in most kitchen drawers. Made from durable plastic that is sturdy to withstand normal wear and tear. Soft-grip lining and non-slip rubber feet ensure that items stay in their place.
body.description: LUXURY BLACK SILVERWARE Satin black makes it looks more retro, creating an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere, elevating everyday meals into a fine dining experience. USING INSTRUCTION: 1. Please wash the silverware set with warm soapy water before first using to wash off any processing residue left from manufacturing. 2. Please clean the silverware set after using and dry the pieces for their durability.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UNIQUE MODERN BLACK FLATWARE SET WITH METALLIC LOOK, MAKE YOUR TABLE SETTING ELEGANT AND DIFFERENT EWFEN 48-Piece Great Value Flatware Set is made of the premium 18/0 stainless steel will not bend, break, or get damaged by heat. This elegant silverware set would elevate your everyday meals into a fine dining experience.

LUXURY BLACK SILVERWARE Satin black makes it looks more retro, creating an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere, elevating everyday meals into a fine dining experience. USING INSTRUCTION: 1. Please wash the silverware set with warm soapy water before first using to wash off any processing residue left from manufacturing. 2. Please clean the silverware set after using and dry the pieces for their durability. 48 PIECES CUTLERY SET, SERVICE FOR 8 Black Dinner Knife x 8 Black Dinner Fork x 8 Black Dinner Spoon x 8 Black Salad Fork x 8 Black Tea Spoon x 8 Steak Knife x 8

Proper gauge thickness and weight, sleek curved edges ensure the utmost comfort. The handles, in particular, provide a natural, balanced feel in hand. Ergonomic design for comfortable grip by both adults and children. In this pack comes with 8 steak knives, no need to purchase another meat knives to fit in the existing silverware set. Sharp serrated blades of the steak knives can easily cut and slice various steaks and other meats. No complicated handle decoration, elegant and simple designis favored by most people, match any style of your dinnerware or tableware set. Highly reflective finishing increase taste of your everyday meals
We are committed to provide unique style and premium quality tableware set to customers. Hope you have a good dining experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great, excellent value
reviews.reviewText: I didn't pay attention to the title and bought based on the picture, so I was pleasantly surprised when I got double the silverware I expected. The metal is thick and attractive, and is comfortable to use. The tray is nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy weight & feel, looks great
reviews.reviewText: I made my wife throw out our old silverware after we started using this set. They come clean easy in the diswasher. She likes the hammered finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful spoon set. It's very heavy and classic
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love everything about this spoon. Very classy and beautiful. Please don't hesitate to buy because you be missing good spoon set. I love the design and the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very thin metal
reviews.reviewText: The silverware works fine and has a lot of pieces. The only complaint I have is the metal is pretty thin and lightweight. It feels pretty cheap when eating with it, but it was cheap to purchase so that's good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: I purchase the black and they are beautiful. I am going to buy a set for my daughters

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We really love this silverware so beautiful and classy looking ...great buy!

reviews.reviewText: Nice inexpensive set as advertised, happy with purchase
